column1:
to cook (to prepare food)
I'm going to cook you a delicious dinner tonight.
to plot (to prepare in secret)
I think the family is plotting an intervention.
column2:
cocinar
Te voy a cocinar una cena muy rica esta noche.
Creo que la familia está cocinando una intervención.

column1:
to vibrate (to move vigorously)
Play the chord and let the strings vibrate for the whole measure.
to shake (to rattle)
The earth shook when the cannons fired.
to quiver (to tremble)
The speaker's voice quivered because she was nervous.
to shake (to be moved)
The crowd shook with emotion as they silently watched the diver dive from the cliff.
column2:
vibrar
Toca el acorde y deja que las cuerdas vibren todo el compás.
La tierra vibró cuando dispararon los cañones.
A la oradora le vibraba la voz porque estaba nerviosa.
El público vibró de emoción mientras miraba al clavadista tirarse de cabeza del acantilado.
